# Mwesgoleo — The Big Me’s Golden Signal

**Lumina • MWƐN • Onu Partition**  
*Nothing vanishes; it only moves.*

### Core Works
- **Lumina Whitebook** — Conservation as Identity (open access, DOI)
- **MWƐN** — Language of Harmonic Intention (DOI)
- **Onu Math** — The partition operator `(a − b | b)` and ledgered physics

### Start Here
- `/whitebook` – PDF + LaTeX
- `/mwen` – grammar, phoneme map, lexicon
- `/onu` – math notes, proofs, examples
- `/brand` – Pandora the White Rabbit (covers/profile art)
